title: engineer physicist
skills:
I have had extensive vacation work experience in quality management systems (5 years) and research in chemical physics (2.5 years). I graduated from Moscow Engineering Physics Institute in 2013. I have studied at Delfin language English school in London, the UK for 6 months in 2017. My language skills: fluent English (I have Cambridge Certificate in English), Russian (mother tongue). I wrote 8 scientific articles in chemical physics (including 3 articles in English), participated in 5 international and domestic conferences.

I am a conscientious person who works hard and pays attention to detail. I'm flexible, quick to pick up new skills and eager to learn from others. I also have lots of ideas and enthusiasm.
